tasks.label: Build demo base image
tasks.command: podman build -f base-image/Dockerfile . --build-arg http_proxy=$HTTP_PROXY --build-arg https_proxy=$HTTPS_PROXY --build-arg no_proxy=$NO_PROXY -t numericalweatherpredictions/polytope/demo/base --format docker

tasks.label: Build demo use-case image
tasks.command: podman build -f Dockerfile.use-case . --build-arg http_proxy=$HTTP_PROXY --build-arg https_proxy=$HTTPS_PROXY --build-arg no_proxy=$NO_PROXY -t numericalweatherpredictions/polytope/demo/use-case --format docker

tasks.label: Build demo notebook image
tasks.command: podman build -f Dockerfile.notebooks . --build-arg http_proxy=$HTTP_PROXY --build-arg https_proxy=$HTTPS_PROXY --build-arg no_proxy=$NO_PROXY -t numericalweatherpredictions/polytope/demo/notebook --format docker
